subject: Re: [junit] Writing a test for a PrintStream and for a log rotation method
msgSnippet: ... Change the method so that it doesn t /create/ a PrintStream, but rather accepts one as a parameter. This way you can substitute it in your tests. -- J. B.
messageBody:
Asif Sattar wrote:
> Hi everyone,
>
> Two questions:
>
> 1. I'm trying to write a test for a method that does not
> return anything. It creates a printstream for writing to a
> log file. I've included the code below. How do I go about
> writing a test for this?

Change the method so that it doesn't /create/ a PrintStream, but rather
accepts one as a parameter. This way you can substitute it in your tests.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
